name: TWINE Interoperability
description: A draft assurance case for interoperable digital twins for the natural environment. This case has been developed for a joint workshop run by the UKs National Oceanography Centre and the Alan Turing Institute.

goals.name: G1
goals.short_description: The digital twin is interoperable with the wider ecosystem of connected digital twins.

strategies.name: S1
strategies.short_description: Sub-argument for compliance with technical standards
strategies.long_description: Sub-argument for compliance with technical standards

property_claims.name: P1
property_claims.short_description: The DT uses standardised data models and formats (e.g., XML, JSON, IFC)
property_claims.long_description: The DT uses standardised data models and formats (e.g., XML, JSON, IFC)

property_claims.name: P2
property_claims.short_description: The DT uses standardised communication protocols (e.g. MQTT, Apache Kafka, or AMQP) for data exchange.
property_claims.long_description: The DT uses standardised communication protocols (e.g. MQTT, Apache Kafka, or AMQP) for data exchange.

property_claims.name: P3
property_claims.short_description: The data models used by the DT have been adapted from the IMFe asset register (or shared back into the asset register)
property_claims.long_description: The data models used by the DT have been adapted from the IMFe asset register (or shared back into the asset register)

property_claims.name: P4
property_claims.short_description: Real-time data streaming capabilities are implemented where necessary.
property_claims.long_description: Real-time data streaming capabilities are implemented where necessary.

property_claims.name: P5
property_claims.short_description: The DT is compatible with the underlying IT infrastructure of the ecosystem.
property_claims.long_description: The DT is compatible with the underlying IT infrastructure of the ecosystem.

property_claims.name: P5.1
property_claims.short_description: Cloud services and platforms used are interoperable with those of other digital twins.
property_claims.long_description: Cloud services and platforms used are interoperable with those of other digital twins.

property_claims.name: P5.2
property_claims.short_description: Security protocols are compatible to allow secure data exchange.
property_claims.long_description: Security protocols are compatible to allow secure data exchange.

property_claims.name: P6
property_claims.short_description: The DT is designed in an extensible and modular manner, allowing for future expansion and integration of additional components or services.
property_claims.long_description: The DT is designed in an extensible and modular manner, allowing for future expansion and integration of additional components or services.

property_claims.name: P6.1
property_claims.short_description: DT interfaces support extension and integration without significant changes to core components.
property_claims.long_description: DT interfaces support extension and integration without significant changes to core components.

property_claims.name: P6.2
property_claims.short_description: The DT provides Open APIs that are well-documented and accessible for external systems to interact seamlessly.
property_claims.long_description: The DT provides Open APIs that are well-documented and accessible for external systems to interact seamlessly.

property_claims.name: P6.2.1
property_claims.short_description: APIs are published and comply with ecosystem requirements for interoperability.
property_claims.long_description: APIs are published and comply with ecosystem requirements for interoperability.

property_claims.name: P6.2.2
property_claims.short_description: APIs include necessary endpoints for data ingestion, querying, and real-time updates.
property_claims.long_description: APIs include necessary endpoints for data ingestion, querying, and real-time updates.

property_claims.name: P7
property_claims.short_description: The DT uses a shared ontology consistent with the ecosystem.
property_claims.long_description: The DT uses a shared ontology consistent with the ecosystem.

property_claims.name: P7.1
property_claims.short_description: Environmental data terms and definitions align with the common ontology.
property_claims.long_description: Environmental data terms and definitions align with the common ontology.

property_claims.name: P7.2
property_claims.short_description: Semantic annotations are applied to data for clarity and consistency.
property_claims.long_description: Semantic annotations are applied to data for clarity and consistency.

property_claims.name: P8
property_claims.short_description: Data quality checks are conducted regularly to ensure consistency with the ecosystem’s ontology.
property_claims.long_description: Data quality checks are conducted regularly to ensure consistency with the ecosystem’s ontology.

property_claims.name: P8.1
property_claims.short_description: Validation rules are applied to incoming data to ensure alignment with shared standards.
property_claims.long_description: Validation rules are applied to incoming data to ensure alignment with shared standards.

property_claims.name: P8.2
property_claims.short_description: Data is cleaned and processed to maintain consistency and reduce redundancy.
property_claims.long_description: Data is cleaned and processed to maintain consistency and reduce redundancy.

property_claims.name: P9
property_claims.short_description: Periodic assessments are scheduled to ensure ongoing compliance.
property_claims.long_description: Periodic assessments are scheduled to ensure ongoing compliance.

property_claims.name: P10
property_claims.short_description: Compliance reports are documented and accessible for verification.
property_claims.long_description: Compliance reports are documented and accessible for verification.

property_claims.name: P11
property_claims.short_description: Participation in ecosystem governance bodies and working groups.
property_claims.long_description: Participation in ecosystem governance bodies and working groups.

property_claims.name: P11.1
property_claims.short_description: Stakeholders attend regular meetings and contribute to policy development.
property_claims.long_description: Stakeholders attend regular meetings and contribute to policy development.

property_claims.name: P11.2
property_claims.short_description: Feedback from the ecosystem is incorporated into the digital twin's development.
property_claims.long_description: Feedback from the ecosystem is incorporated into the digital twin's development.

property_claims.name: P12
property_claims.short_description: Changes to the DT are managed through a structured change management process.
property_claims.long_description: Changes to the DT are managed through a structured change management process.

property_claims.name: P12.1
property_claims.short_description: Changes are tracked, and historical versions are archived for audit purposes.
property_claims.long_description: Changes are tracked, and historical versions are archived for audit purposes.

property_claims.name: P12.2
property_claims.short_description: Change impact assessments are conducted for significant updates to evaluate the effect on interoperability.
property_claims.long_description: Change impact assessments are conducted for significant updates to evaluate the effect on interoperability.

property_claims.name: P12.3
property_claims.short_description: Stakeholders are engaged in the change process to gather input and minimise disruptions.
property_claims.long_description: Stakeholders are engaged in the change process to gather input and minimise disruptions.

property_claims.name: P13
property_claims.short_description: Clear policies are established and communicated with stakeholders, outlining necessary roles and responsibilities.
property_claims.long_description: Clear policies are established and communicated with stakeholders, outlining necessary roles and responsibilities.

property_claims.name: P13.1
property_claims.short_description: Sufficient data ownership policies have been established.
property_claims.long_description: Sufficient data ownership policies have been established.

property_claims.name: P13.2
property_claims.short_description: Sufficient access rights and security policies have been established.
property_claims.long_description: Sufficient access rights and security policies have been established.

property_claims.name: P13.3
property_claims.short_description: Clear accountability policies have been implemented.
property_claims.long_description: Clear accountability policies have been implemented.

property_claims.name: P14
property_claims.short_description: A feedback loop is established to continually improve the DT based on user and ecosystem input.
property_claims.long_description: A feedback loop is established to continually improve the DT based on user and ecosystem input.

property_claims.name: P14.1
property_claims.short_description: Stakeholder and user feedback is systematically gathered and assessed to improve system capabilities.
property_claims.long_description: Stakeholder and user feedback is systematically gathered and assessed to improve system capabilities.

strategies.name: S4
strategies.short_description: Sub-argument for user and ecosystem interaction
strategies.long_description: Sub-argument for user and ecosystem interaction
